name: Cloud Jump
description:
Take to the clouds in this single-player 3D precision platformer! Jump over obstacles and navigate moving platforms as you make your way through the sky.

Gameplay features:

- 4 unique, hand-crafted platforming levels
- In-game collectibles
- Sci-fi soundtrack
- Offline save system
- Customizable player preferences

Cloud Jump can be played on Windows 10/11 systems. A widescreen resolution is recommended.
